content.value:
So, does Elon Musk's new paid Twitter Blue verification system lead to more scams? ü§î

Hmmm, I don't know, let's ask this Verified Twitter account over here, he seems rather official.üîµTens of thousands of people seem to agree... ‚òùÔ∏èüßê

content.html: Few notes. If you teach your user base, verification means something specific, it will be hard for them to unlearn it. We learned that it's rare for a verified account trying to phish us. Changing the meaning of the check is a security issue.
content.value: Few notes. If you teach your user base, verification means something specific, it will be hard for them to unlearn it. We learned that it's rare for a verified account trying to phish us. Changing the meaning of the check is a security issue.
